docker run --rm -e RUN_LOCAL=true -e VALIDATE_CHECKOV=false -e IGNORE_GENERATED_FILES=true -e VALIDATE_PYTHON_PYLINT=false -e VALIDATE_PYTHON=true -e LINTER_RULES_PATH=./config/lint -e PYTHON_BLACK_CONFIG_FILE=pyproject.toml -v E:\projects\Eldritch-Horror-Bot:/tmp/lint -v E:\projects\Eldritch-Horror-Bot/config/lint:/tmp/lint/config/lint github/super-linter
